title: Sky News: Gemma Lloyd, co-founder Diverse City Careers (DCC)
author: WORK180
body:
Sky News LIVE interview on Women in Entrepreneurship with Gemma Lloyd, Director Client Engagement and co-founder of DCC Jobs and Shivani Gopal, founder of The Remarkable Woman.  


 

About DCC Jobs

DCC Jobs is a jobs board with a difference! We pre-screen employers on paid parental leave, pay equity, flexible working arrangements and much more. This information is not publicly listed elsewhere and is an essential tool in your job search when assessing employers.
